overview:
Lyndsi Sherman is the Marketing Associate at First Associates Loan Servicing, LLC.

As a recent graduate from SDSU, Ms. Sherman is very grateful for the opportunity to work with First Associates. Although Ms. Sherman did not graduate with a degree in Marketing, her true passion does lie within the Marketing sphere.

Ms. Sherman monitors First Associate’s Social Media presence which includes, Linkedin, Crunchbase, and Blogger. She also works closely with Vertical Response to launch First Associates’ weekly e-mail campaign to potential clients. Ms. Sherman truly enjoys her time at First Associates, and is soaking up as much knowledge as possible from the financial industry.
